metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with Envisat ASAR and MODIS in the arid region hydrological experimental area on May 24, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：中游干旱区水文试验区Envisat ASAR和MODIS地面同步观测数据集（2008年5月24日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with Envisat ASAR and MODIS was obtained in the arid region hydrological experimental area on May 24, 2008.
     The Envisat ASAR data were in AP mode and VV/VH polarization combinations, and the overpass time was approximately at 11:34 BJT.
     Observation items included:
     (1) The radiative temperature of Reaumuria soongorica and the bare soil in Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot (HZZHMYD2)was collected using ThermaCAM SC2000 (1.2m above the ground, FOV = 24°×18°), along the diagonal (NW-SE). The data included raw data (read by ThermaCAM Researcher 2001), recorded data and the blackbody calibrated data (archived as Excel files).
     (2) The radiative temperature by the automatic thermometer (FOV: 10°; emissivity: 0.95), were measured at nadir with time intervals of one second. Raw data, blackbody calibrated data and processed data were all archived as Excel files.
     (3) The radiative temperature in Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot by the handheld infrared thermometer (which belongs to BNU) along the diagonal (NW-SE). Raw data (.doc), blackbody calibrated data and processed data (in Excel format) were all archived.
     (4) Soil moisture (0-40cm) by the cutting ring and the soil temperature by the thermocouple thermometer in Yingke oasis and Huazhaizi foci experimental area. Besides, (a) roughness of No. 1 and 2 Huazhizi desert plots was also measured by self-made instruments . Sample points were selected every 30m along the diagonal of each plot. (b) soil profile moisture (0-100cm) and the temperature in the maize field of Yingke oasis. (c) soil profile moisture (0-100cm) and the temperature in one orchard of Yingke Oasis. Data were all archived as Excel files.
     (5) the photosynthetic rate of alfalfa and barley at Linze grass station by LI-6400. Raw data were archived in the user-defined format  (by notepat.exe) and processed data were as Excel files.
     (6) ground object reflectance spectra of new-born rape and the bare land in Biandukou foci experimental area by ASD FieldSpec (350～2500 nm) from Institute of Remote Sensing Applications (CAS). Raw data were binary files direct from ASD (by ViewSpecPro), and pre-processed data on reflectance were in Excel format.
     (7) LAI by the measuring tape and the ruler in the alfalfa field of Linze grass station. The maximum length and width of alfalfa leaves and barley were measured. Data were archived as Excel files.
     (8) surface roughness in Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot with the self-made roughness board (Cold and Arid Regions Environmental and Engineering Research Institute, CAS), the digital camera and the compass. Sample points were selected at equal intervals along the diagonals and marked in the photos.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2008年5月24日在中游干旱区水文试验区进行了Envisat ASAR与MODIS同步观测，地面数据包括土壤水分与温度，地表辐射温度，地表粗糙度。
Envisat ASAR数据为AP模式，VV/VH极化组合方式，过境时间约为11:34BJT。
试验内容：
 （1）热像仪ThermaCAM SC2000测量得到的辐射温度。测量对象为花寨子荒漠样地2的植被（红砂）与荒漠裸土的辐射温度。仪器获取视场角为24°×18°组分辐射温度数据，并同时拍摄同视场的光学照片。热像仪拍摄高度约为1.2m。 采样方式为沿着样地西北-东南对角线采样。 本数据包括原始数据与记录、仪器黑体定标数据。原始数据可利用配套处理软件ThermaCAM Researcher 2001，也可将数据在该软件中转换为其他格式，自行编程读取。仪器黑体定标数据以Excel格式存储。     
（2）固定自记点温计测量的辐射温度。测量样地为花寨子荒漠样地2。测量对象为植被（红砂）冠层和荒漠裸土。仪器的视场角约为10°，垂直向下观测，采样间隔为1s。架设高度见数据文档。仪器设定比辐射率为0.95。本数据包括原始数据与经过黑体定标、比辐射率纠正后的处理数据。均以Excel格式保存。    
（3）手持式红外温度计测量的辐射温度数据。测量对象为花寨子荒漠样地2。测量仪器为北师大的手持式红外温度计，采样方式为条带观测。数据包括原始数据与记录数据、经过黑体定标后的温度数据。原始数据为Word的doc格式。处理后数据以Excel格式保存。    
（4）在盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠加密观测区测量的有关土壤水分与土壤温度等数据，包括①花寨子荒漠0-40cm的土壤水分和土壤温度，花寨子荒漠样地1和花寨子荒漠样地2粗糙度数据。土壤水分测量利用换刀取样称重法，土壤温度用热电偶测得；粗糙度测量利用自制测量仪器和照相法，沿花寨子荒漠样地1和花寨子荒漠样地2样地两个对角线每隔30m采样，采样方式为东西向和南北向各一次。②在盈科绿洲玉米地测量了0-100cm土壤剖面水分和温度数据。③在盈科绿洲玉米地一果园处测量了0-100cm土壤剖面水分和温度数据。数据以Excel保存。    
（5）LI-6400光合仪光合速率数据.测量对象为临泽草地苜蓿和大麦。其数据包括原始数据和处理数据。 原始数据以仪器自定义格式保存，可用记事本等常用软件打开。处理数据以Excel保存。数据参数见数据文件。
（6）在扁都口加密观测区测量的ASD光谱仪数据。测量仪器为中国科学院遥感应用研究所的光谱仪（350-2500nm），采样方式为垂直观测和条带观测，扁都口地表类型为新出油菜苗和裸土。数据包括原始数据与记录数据、处理后的反射率数据。本数据的原始数据为ASD标准格式，可利用其自带软件ViewSpec打开。处理后的反射率数据以Excel格式保存。    
（7）在临泽草地苜蓿地测量的LAI数据。测量方法为：利用皮尺、卷尺、直尺测量在临泽草地测量苜蓿和大麦每株各叶片的最大长度和最大宽度。利用室内扫描真实叶面积与最大长度和最小宽度的转换系数，获得叶面积指数。这天数据没有利用激光叶面积仪测量。本数据以Excel保存。
（8）地表粗糙度采用照相法测量粗糙度。测量仪器为中国科学院寒区旱区环境与工程研究所自制的粗糙度板、数码相机和罗盘。自制的粗糙度板、数码相机和罗盘。当日测量对象为花寨子荒漠样地2。沿着样地两条对角线等间隔采样测量，每次测量包括东西向和南北向，每张照片上具有测量标示。该数据现在为记录表和照片

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure surface roughness in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量干旱地区表面粗糙度的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to measure surface roughness in arid regions is the photographic method, which involves using a custom-made roughness board, digital camera, and compass. Measurements are taken along two diagonals of a sample plot, with each measurement including both east-west and north-south orientations. The resulting data consists of record tables and photographs.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区测量表面粗糙度的一种数据收集方法是摄影法，该方法涉及使用定制的粗糙度板、数码相机和指南针。测量沿样本地块的两个对角线进行，每个测量包括东西方向和南北方向。最终的数据包括记录表和照片。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of datasets that involve the simultaneous observation of Envisat ASAR and MODIS in arid hydrological test areas?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 涉及在干旱水文试验区同时观察Envisat ASAR和MODIS的数据集的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: soil moisture, temperature, surface radiation temperature, surface roughness, Envisat ASAR data in AP mode, VV/VH polarization, 11:34 BJT, thermal camera measurements, fixed thermometers, handheld infrared thermometers, sampling and weighing methods, thermocouples, custom instruments, photographic methods, Excel format, doc format, ASD standard format
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度、温度、地表辐射温度、地表粗糙度、Envisat ASAR数据（AP模式）、VV/VH极化、11:34 北京时间、热成像仪测量、固定温度计、手持红外温度计、采样和称重方法、热电偶、自定义仪器、摄影方法、Excel格式、doc格式、ASD标准格式。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different measurement instruments were utilized in the data collection methods for soil moisture and temperature in the arid zone hydrological experimental area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在干旱区水文实验区的数据收集方法中，使用了多少种不同的测量仪器来测量土壤湿度和温度？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using Envisat ASAR and MODIS for synchronized observations in hydrological experiments in arid regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的水文实验中，使用Envisat ASAR和MODIS进行同步观测的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Using Envisat ASAR and MODIS for synchronized observations allows researchers to gather comprehensive data on soil moisture, temperature, surface radiation, and roughness in arid regions. Envisat ASAR, with its AP mode and VV/VH polarization, provides detailed radar data, while MODIS offers complementary optical data. This combination enhances the understanding of hydrological processes by providing multi-dimensional insights into the surface conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用Envisat ASAR和MODIS进行同步观测，使研究人员能够在干旱地区收集关于土壤湿度、温度、表面辐射和粗糙度的综合数据。Envisat ASAR通过其AP模式和VV/VH极化提供详细的雷达数据，而MODIS则提供互补的光学数据。这种组合通过提供对表面条件的多维洞察，增强了对水文过程的理解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods for measuring soil moisture and temperature differ between using thermocouples and the gravimetric method, and what are the implications for data accuracy and precision?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 测量土壤湿度和温度的方法在使用热电偶和重力法之间存在差异，这对数据的准确性和精确性有何影响？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Soil moisture is measured using the gravimetric method, which involves sampling and weighing, while soil temperature is measured using thermocouples. The gravimetric method provides direct measurements of soil moisture content by weight, which can be highly accurate but may be labor-intensive and less frequent. In contrast, thermocouples provide continuous, real-time temperature data, allowing for detailed temporal analysis. The implications for data accuracy and precision depend on the specific requirements of the study; gravimetric methods may offer more precise moisture content data, whereas thermocouples provide a dynamic view of temperature changes.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度通过重力法进行测量，该方法涉及取样和称重，而土壤温度则使用热电偶进行测量。重力法通过重量提供土壤湿度含量的直接测量，这种方法可以非常准确，但可能劳动密集且测量频率较低。相比之下，热电偶提供连续的实时温度数据，允许进行详细的时间分析。数据的准确性和精确性的影响取决于研究的具体要求；重力法可能提供更精确的湿度含量数据，而热电偶则提供温度变化的动态视图。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately measuring soil moisture and temperature in arid regions using a combination of remote sensing and ground-based observations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用遥感和地面观测相结合的方法在干旱地区准确测量土壤湿度和温度面临哪些挑战因素？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Factors contributing to challenges in accurately measuring soil moisture and temperature in arid regions include variations in soil surface roughness, the need for precise calibration of instruments like thermal cameras and thermometers, and the heterogeneity of ground surface conditions such as vegetation cover and bare soil. The use of different instruments with varying field of view and sampling methods, such as diagonal line sampling and strip observations, also introduces complexities in data consistency and integration.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，准确测量土壤湿度和温度面临的挑战因素包括土壤表面粗糙度的变化、对热像仪和温度计等仪器进行精确校准的需求，以及地面条件的异质性，如植被覆盖和裸露土壤。使用不同的仪器，其视场和采样方法（如对角线采样和条带观测）也会给数据的一致性和整合带来复杂性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind collecting synchronized Envisat ASAR and MODIS observations along with ground measurements like soil moisture and surface roughness in an arid hydrological experimental area?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱水文实验区收集同步的Envisat ASAR和MODIS观测数据，以及土壤湿度和地表粗糙度等地面测量的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives include understanding the interactions between surface conditions, such as soil moisture and roughness, and satellite observations to improve remote sensing data calibration and validation, enhancing the accuracy of environmental monitoring in arid regions. These measurements aim to provide comprehensive insights into the hydrological processes and surface characteristics, facilitating the development of more accurate models for climate and water resource management in dryland environments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括理解表面条件（如土壤湿度和粗糙度）与卫星观测之间的相互作用，以改善遥感数据的校准和验证，提高干旱地区环境监测的准确性。这些测量旨在提供对水文过程和表面特征的全面洞察，促进更准确的气候和水资源管理模型在干旱环境中的发展。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods and instruments are used to measure soil moisture, temperature, and surface roughness in arid regions, and how are these data points typically processed and stored?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，测量土壤湿度、温度和表面粗糙度的方法和仪器有哪些，这些数据点通常如何处理和存储？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Soil moisture and temperature are measured using methods like the knife sampling method for soil moisture and thermocouples for temperature. Surface roughness is measured using self-made instruments and photographic methods. Sampling is conducted along diagonal lines at set intervals, and data are stored in Excel format. Soil moisture and temperature data are collected at varying depths, and surface roughness data is gathered using a self-made instrument and photographic method along specified diagonals. Collected data are processed and stored in Excel spreadsheets.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度和温度使用刀具取样法测量土壤湿度，使用热电偶测量温度。表面粗糙度通过自制仪器和摄影方法进行测量。采样沿着设定间隔的对角线进行，数据存储在Excel格式中。土壤湿度和温度数据在不同深度收集，表面粗糙度数据通过自制仪器和摄影方法沿指定对角线收集。收集的数据经过处理并存储在Excel电子表格中。
